pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenic video showcases a historic church tower in a city. The camera pulls back and pans to reveal the surrounding street, which features a mix of old and modern architecture. The shots are filmed from a low angle, looking up at the steeple against a bright, partly cloudy sky.
